title: Vacuum Cleaner DV-30
description: The DV-30 is an extremely efficient dry and wet vacuum cleaner designed to tackle the tough cleaning challenges encountered in industrial, commercial, and workshop settings. It is equipped with a powerful motor of 1400W along with a sturdy 30-liter stainless-steel tank It provides powerful suction to eliminate dust, debris, liquid, and spills with ease. If it's cleaning the workplace floor, a shop, or the residue of machinery, the DV-30 has been designed to last for years of service, day after day.Its compact dimensions, along with smooth-rolling wheels and ergonomic design, make it simple for users to transport, simple to use, and efficient to use for a long time. The high-efficiency filtering system integrated assures clean air flow, which is secure for users as well as the environment.
keyFeatures: 30-Litre Durable Tank – Robust tank capacity ensures longer cleaning time with fewer interruptions.
Multi-Surface Cleaning – Perfect for cleaning floors, carpets, sofas, office spaces, workshops, and more.
Portable & Lightweight Design – Easy to move and operate with sturdy wheels and ergonomic handle.
Low Noise Operation – Designed to work efficiently with minimal noise – perfect for home and commercial use.
Easy Drainage System – Comes with a water drain plug for hassle-free emptying after wet use.
Washable & Reusable Filter – Environment-friendly design with easily washable filters for long-term use.
Dual Function – Wet & Dry Cleaning – Efficiently handles both liquid spills and dry dust, making it ideal for versatile cleaning needs.
Compact Yet Powerful – Equipped with a 1400W high-suction motor to deliver strong and consistent performance.
